name: PANDARA
description:
An exceedingly simple 2D scrolling shooter.
Press Z to shoot. Press X to change speed.

>Introduction
"PANDARA"
Year : 2014-2016
Game Type : Shooter
Number of Players : 1

>BILINGUAL
Japanese and English story.

>SYNOPSIS
What went wrong?
When the box opened,
all color drained out of the world.
This greyness blankets everything,
and the emperor brings judgment
upon all from the unreachable sky.
Anything that has the potential
to threaten the peace is removed soundlessly.
The animals have always known only black and white,
and they have chosen to fight.
They fight to destroy the woman who opened the box...
Wiseman 31 Cleare.
